sentences.en: Happiness exists in spiritual poverty and gratitude in materialistic poverty.
sentences.cn: 幸福存在于心灵的贫乏.感激存乎于物质的贫乏.

sentences.en: Hegel's and Feuerbach's philosophy are the main theoretical root of materialistic dialectics.
sentences.cn: 黑格尔哲学和费尔巴哈哲学是唯物辩证法的主要理论来源.

sentences.en: I am hardworking and am non - materialistic.
sentences.cn: 我是勤勉和上午 非 唯物论.

sentences.en: I'm worrying something, girls in China is becoming materialistic.
sentences.cn: 我有些担心, 中国的女孩子变得原来越崇尚物质.

sentences.en: In this more and more materialistic world.
sentences.cn: 在这越来越功利主义的世界.

sentences.en: It is materialistic because It'says that the only substances are material substances.
sentences.cn: 它是唯物主义是因为它说唯一的实体是物质.

sentences.en: Materialistic dialectics is an important part of constituting Marxism.
sentences.cn: 唯物辩证法是马克思主义的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: She made him both soft and materialistic.
sentences.cn: 她把他变成女性化而又实际化.

sentences.en: The basic idea was to take a materialistic view of human nature.
sentences.cn: 此想法的基本概念,就是以唯物主义的观点看待人性.

sentences.en: The majority of the educated grew materialistic in their mental outlook.
sentences.cn: 大多数教育是在他们的精神面貌上增长了唯物主义.

sentences.en: The materialistic dialectics that any thing is the contradictory entity.
sentences.cn: 唯物辩证法认为,任何事物都是矛盾的统一体.

sentences.en: the materialistic values of American society
sentences.cn: 美国社会的实利主义价值观

sentences.en: The pursuit of materialistic goals usually hinders the pursuit of happiness.
sentences.cn: 以追求物质生活为目标往往会阻碍我们对幸福的追求.

sentences.en: The symbiotic aesthetical view point is materialistic, various and creative.
sentences.cn: 共生美学观是一种唯物的 、 多元的、创造性的美学观.

sentences.en: Therefore, this paper tries to study Karl Marx's historical materialistic justice thoughts.
sentences.cn: 因此, 本文试图探讨马克思历史唯物主义的正义思想.

sentences.en: VOICE: Is he saying that all science is materialistic or atheistic?
sentences.cn: 那他是说所有的科学都是唯物论或是无神论的?

words.tran_cn: 唯物主义；唯物论；物质主义
唯物主义者；实利主义者

trans.tran_cn: 物质至上主义的，贪图享乐的
trans.tran_en: concerned only with money and possessions rather than things of the mind such as art, religion, or moral beliefs – used in order to show disapproval
